name: firewall
description: Firewall is an example of cooperating hooks: firewall hook instances filter incoming payments, based on shared state maintained by blacklist hook.

scripts.compile: ../../assemblyscript/bin/asc.js --disable=bulk-memory --runtime=stub blacklist.ts -O3 -o blacklist.wasm && hook-cleaner blacklist.wasm && ../../assemblyscript/bin/asc.js --disable=bulk-memory --runtime=stub firewall.ts -O3 -o firewall.wasm && hook-cleaner firewall.wasm
